com.netscape.cms.servlet.request

Interface IReqParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CertReqParser, KeyReqParser, ReqParser

    public interface IReqParser
    An interface representing a request parser which converts Java request object into name value pairs and vice versa.

    Version:
    $Revision$, $Date$
